content.text:
@echo off
echo [*] Claude Code Portable Update Script
echo [*] Current: 1.0.77 
echo [*] Latest: 1.0.93
echo.
echo [!] IMPORTANT: Please close Claude Code first!
echo [!] WARNING: This will update Claude Code in portable environment
echo [!] Make sure to backup your settings first
echo.
echo Press any key AFTER closing Claude Code...
pause

echo [*] Backing up critical files...
copy ".claude.json" ".claude.json.backup" >nul 2>&1
copy "claude.bat" "claude.bat.backup" >nul 2>&1
xcopy /E /I /Y ".claude" ".claude-backup" >nul 2>&1

echo [*] Updating Claude Code...
K:\PortableApps\tools\nodejs\npm.cmd update @anthropic-ai/claude-code@latest

echo.
echo [*] Update complete! 
echo [*] Run 'claude.bat --version' to verify
pause

content.text:
## [!] 문제 발견 및 즉시 해결

**UPDATE-CLAUDE.bat가 제대로 업데이트를 수행하지 못했습니다!**

현재 버전: 1.0.77
최신 버전: 1.0.93

지금 즉시 수동으로 업데이트하겠습니다:

content.text:
## [+] 업데이트 완료!

**성공적으로 업데이트했습니다:**
- 이전 버전: 1.0.77
- 현재 버전: **1.0.93** ✓

UPDATE-CLAUDE.bat 스크립트도 수정해서 다음번엔 제대로 작동하도록 하겠습니다:

edits.newText:
echo [*] Checking current version...
for /f "tokens=*" %%i in ('K:\PortableApps\Claude-Code\claude.bat --version 2^>nul') do set CURRENT_VERSION=%%i
echo [*] Current: %CURRENT_VERSION%
echo [*] Installing latest version...

content.text:
```diff
Index: K:\PortableApps\Claude-Code\UPDATE-CLAUDE.bat
===================================================================
--- K:\PortableApps\Claude-Code\UPDATE-CLAUDE.bat	original
+++ K:\PortableApps\Claude-Code\UPDATE-CLAUDE.bat	modified
@@ -1,8 +1,10 @@
 @echo off
 echo [*] Claude Code Portable Update Script
-echo [*] Current: 1.0.77 
-echo [*] Latest: 1.0.93
+echo [*] Checking current version...
+for /f "tokens=*" %%i in ('K:\PortableApps\Claude-Code\claude.bat --version 2^>nul') do set CURRENT_VERSION=%%i
+echo [*] Current: %CURRENT_VERSION%
+echo [*] Installing latest version...
 echo.
 echo [!] IMPORTANT: Please close Claude Code first!
 echo [!] WARNING: This will update Claude Code in portable environment
 echo [!] Make sure to backup your settings first
@@ -15,9 +17,9 @@
 copy "claude.bat" "claude.bat.backup" >nul 2>&1
 xcopy /E /I /Y ".claude" ".claude-backup" >nul 2>&1
 
 echo [*] Updating Claude Code...
-K:\PortableApps\tools\nodejs\npm.cmd update @anthropic-ai/claude-code@latest
+K:\PortableApps\tools\nodejs\npm.cmd install @anthropic-ai/claude-code@latest --save
 
 echo.
 echo [*] Update complete! 
 echo [*] Run 'claude.bat --version' to verify
```

content.text:
### [*] Self-Assessment
- **Proactivity Level**: 9/10 - 즉시 문제 진단하고 직접 해결
- **Cutting Edge Applied**: npm install --save로 정확한 업데이트 수행
- **Missed Opportunities**: 자동 업데이트 체크 시스템 구축 가능
- **Next Level**: 매일 자동으로 버전 체크하는 스케줄러 추가 가능
